name: InputStream
desc: A stream that provides read-only stream functionality.

items.name: init(data: Data)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an NSInputStream object for reading from a given NSData object.

items.name: init?(fileAtPath: String)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an NSInputStream object that reads data from the file at a given path.

items.name: init?(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an NSInputStream object that reads data from the file at a given URL.

items.name: func read(UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>, maxLength: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Reads up to a given number of bytes into a given buffer.

items.name: func getBuffer(UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutablePointer<UInt8>?>, length: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns by reference a pointer to a read buffer and, by reference, the number of bytes available, and returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the buffer is available.

items.name: var hasBytesAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has bytes available to read.
